# Test support for declaring needed Go version in module.

env GO111MODULE=on
env TESTGO_VERSION=golang1.21

! golang list
stderr -count=1 '^golang: sub@v1.0.0: module ./sub requires golang >= 1.999 \(running golang 1.21\)$'
! golang build sub
stderr -count=1 '^golang: sub@v1.0.0: module ./sub requires golang >= 1.999 \(running golang 1.21\)$'

-- golang.mod --
module m
golang 1.1
require (
	sub v1.0.0
)
replace (
	sub => ./sub
)

-- x.golang --
package x

-- sub/golang.mod --
module sub
golang 1.999

-- sub/x.golang --
package x
